parameters.command: echo "CPU: $(top -bn1 | grep 'Cpu(s)' | sed 's/.*, *\([0-9.]*\)%* id.*/\1/' | awk '{print 100 - $1"%"}'), MEMÃ“RIA: $(free -m | awk '/Mem:/ { printf("%.2f%"), $3/$2 * 100 }'), HD: $(df -h / | awk 'NR==2 {print $5}')"
